lines: dev do naavon par savaar hua svayan ko paata tha
haradam use lagata tha ki veena hai usake saath to usaka dard koee maayane nahin rakhata
doosara vah kabhee sochata veena kee nijee jindagee ke baare mein to lagata usane anyaay kiya hai usake saath shaadee karake
dard jab bhee badh jaata to use dar lagane lagata ki yah dard sada rahane laga to na jaane isaka parinaam kya ho dherasee kitaaben padhane laga tha
dhoondhane laga tha dard ka kaaran
lekin kitaabon kee baat kya ek sach jo use saamane dikhane laga tha usase munh chhipaane ke lie vah veena kee baanhon ka sahaara lie rahata tha
ek kshan bhee use apanee aankhon se door na kar paane kee usakee chaah veena ko apane prati prem hee lagatee thee
vah prem kee divaanee yahee bhaav haradam man mein lie rahatee thee ki dev kitana chaahata hai use aisee chaahat usakee dekhakar dev apana dard bheetar hee bheetar chhipae rakhane laga tha
ab usane apanee dinacharya mein veena ka saath chaubees ghante ka bana liya tha
kolej bhee vah veena ko saath le jaane laga tha
subah nau baje se do baje ke beech saptaah mein paanch din doyaateen lekchar dene hote the
itana samay veena staapharoom mein baithee rahatee
usaka samay badee saralata se kat jaata tha
dev ka koee na koee saathee usase baaten karata rahata ya phir vah kisee na kisee patrika ke panne palatatee rahatee
kuchh aur nahin hota to staaph room kee khidakee se baahar mastee mein ghoom rahe chhaatrachhaatraon ko dekhatee rahatee
skool mein jis anushaasan mein usane padhaaya tha vah anushaasan use yahaan kolej mein nahin dikhata tha
svachchhand bhaav se vicharate mastee karate hue chhaatron ko dekhana use bahut achchha lagata tha
aise samay vah kalpana bhee karatee ki kaash vah bhee yahaan padha rahee hotee
dev se apanee ichchha jaahir kar dee thee usane
tab dev ne yahee kaha tha usase ki sirph post grejuet kee digree ke hone se ab kolej mein naukaree nahin lag sakatee
saath mein peeechadee hona jarooree ho gaya hai
veena kya risarch karana chaahegee
padhaee ek baar chhoot jae to dubaara shuroo karana bahut kathin hota hai
lekin veena svayan ko aur padhaee ke lie taiyaar bhee nahin paatee thee
jo padh liya vahee kaaphee hai
bas badalee ho jae aur vah skool jaana shuroo kar de
ham jo sochate hain jarooree nahin ki vah sach mein badal jae
sapane sabhee saakaar nahin hote
sochate kuchh hain hota vahee hai jo bhaagy mein likha ho
haan bhaagy mein likhe ko sahaj hokar len to duhkh duhkh nahin lagata
samayachakr apanee gati se chalata hai
veena samayachakr ke saath chalatee achchhe kee hee kalpana karatee thee
lekin jo pareshaanee ka daur shuroo ho chuka tha vah ab rukane ka naam nahin le raha tha
dev ka dard ab ek niyamit dinacharya ka roop dhaaran kar chuka tha
gharabhar mein sabako khabar lag gaee thee
maan krshna ko pata laga to vah bhee yahee bolee  dubaara jao beta doktar ke paas
dev tab unhen kya kahata chupachaap haan kah kar veena ke saath apane kamare mein aa gaya
bistar par letate hue usane veena se yahee kaha  mujhe us din doktar gupta kee baat achchhee nahin lagee
laga ki vah jaise apanee galatee par parda daal rahe hon
aise mein main soch raha hoon ki kyon na main apanee sanstha ke maadhyam se aims mein apana poora chaikap karavaoon
agar ve kahenge to rediyotharaipee karava lenge
dev ne veena ko pahale se hee apanee klostamee peshent sosaitee ke vishay mein bata rakha tha
is sanstha kee sthaapana mein huee thee jab isake rogee shree raajendr garg ke sambandhiyon ko klostamee baig ke lie daradar bhatakana pada tha
unhonne hee svasth hone ke uparaant apana saara samay is sanstha ko chalaane mein vyateet karana shuroo kar diya tha
ve jab bhee pata chalata jahaan bhee rogee hota pahunch jaate aur is rog se sambandhit sabhee jaanakaaree mareez va usake parivaar vaalon ko de dete the
aise mein desh ke har bade aspataal mein sabhee doktaron se unaka sampark sthaapit rahata tha

haan dev ko is sanstha ke baare mein opareshan ke samay isalie nahin pata chala tha kyonki use ek praeevet narsing hom mein bhartee karavaaya gaya tha aur vaheen doktar gupta ne usaka opareshan kar diya tha

is sanstha ke vishay mein jaanakaaree to use opareshan ke chhah maheene baad lagee jab use baarabaar apane baig mangavaane ke lie videsh rah rahe kisee na kisee jaanakaar ko kahane mein sharm aane lagee thee
sabhee usakee madad karate the
apane kharche par baig bhej dete the lekin paise koee nahin leta tha
aise mein usane baig banaane vaalee kampanee ko jab likha to use vaapasee daak se javaab aa gaya
dev ko tab yah jaanakar aashchary hua tha ki ek sanstha hai yahaan dillee mein jo sab saadhan jutaatee hai
garg saahab se mila to jaanakar aashchary hua ki keval dillee mein hee isake lagabhag sau rogee hain
sabase milakar use apane jeevan ke prati aur adhik aasha bandh gaee
sabhee hanseekhushee jeevan bita rahe the
aise mein hee ghar vaalon ke munh se apanee shaadee kee baat sunana use achchha lagane laga tha
veena ne usake jeevan mein aana tha to aasha kee har kiran use sunaharee hee lagatee thee
veena ko saath lekar vah garg saahab se mila
unhonne agale hee din dev ke lie doktar se milane ka samay tay karava liya
garg saahab kee umr painsath ke lagabhag thee
pachaas varsh ke the jab opareshan hua tha
apana jeevan unhonne sanstha ko samarpit kar rakha tha
aise mein devaveena ke saath chalane ko vah bhee utsuk the aur agale din aspataal mein milane kee jagah tay kar devaveena ne unase vida lee
doktar kumaar ne achchhee tarah se dev ka nireekshan kiya
saaree ripotars ko dhyaan se dekha
ant mein phaeel ke panne palatate hue bole  opareshan ke baad ke kaagaj kahaan hain
sab kaagaz isee mein lage hain
dev ne kaha
vah to main dekh raha hoon
lekin opareshan ke baad tumhaaree rediyotharaipee huee hogee usakee jaanakaaree isamen darz nahin hai
doktar kumaar ne phaeel ke panne palatate hue kaha
yah sunakar dev chaink gaya
rediyotharaipee kee baat ekaek pahale doktar gupta ne kee thee
usane ise gambheerata se nahin liya tha kyonki doktar gupta ne chintit na hone ko kah diya tha
ab vahee baat doktar kumaar ke munh se sunakar vah ekaek bechain ho utha tha
usee bechainee bhare bhaavon se bola  meree rediyotharaipee to huee nahin
yah sunakar doktar kumaar chaink uthe
bole  kya doktar gupta ne jikr nahin kiya tha opareshan ke baad isaka
nahin doktar kabhee nahin
opareshan ke do saal tak main niyamit roop se unase apana chaikap karavaata raha
unhonne kabhee nahin kaha tha aur na hee mujhe kabhee pareshaanee huee thee
haan ab dard hone ke baad jab main gaya to pahalee baar unhonne mujhase kaha
tab bhee vah baat ko taal gae
dev ne vistaar se bataaya
doktar kumaar ko aashchary hua dev kee baat sunakar
unhen dev kee baat sach lag rahee thee
lekin aashchary tha ki doktar gupta jaise anubhavee doktar ne yah risk kaise le liya bole  aisa kaise ho sakata hai doktar gupta to bahut samajhadaar hain
dev aur chintit ho utha
saath baithee veena aur garg saahab bhee pareshaanee mahasoos kar rahe the
isase koee pareshaanee ho sakatee hai kya  dev ne chintit svar mein poochha
doktar kumaar ne dev ke chehare par pareshaanee ke lakshan padh lie the bole  pareshaanee ho bhee sakatee hai aur nahin bhee
abhee ghabaraane kee baat nahin hai
phir kuchh sochakar bole  aisa karate hain ek baar phir se tumhaaree baayopsee karava lete hain
riport aane par hee vichaar karenge
baayopsee ka naam sunakar dev ko apane saamane sab kuchh ghoomata nazar aaya
lekin himmat vaala tha palabhar mein sambhal gaya aur bola  baayopsee yaani aapako lag raha hai dubaara se kainsar ka khatara
main abhee nishchit roop se kuchh nahin kah sakata
aap padhelikhe hain samajhadaar hain iseelie aapase kuchh parda nahin rakh raha

raidiyotharaipee se hamaaree koshish rahatee hai ki opareshan ke baad yadi kaheen koee kainsar ka keetaanu rah jae to aasapaas ke hisse ko isakee madad se ham aage aane vaale khatare ko rok sakate hain
lekin jarooree nahin hai ki yah phir se ho
iseelie main koee bhee risk nahin lena chaahata
phir aashvaasan bhare shabd kahe unhonne  lekin abhee se chintit na hon aap main koee bhee chaans nahin lena chaahata
jo hai vah saamane aana chaahie aur jo kuchh hona hai ham use taal nahin sakate
haan koshish kar sakate hain usaka phailana roke rahen
veena aage nahin sun paee
usaka man kaheen aur kho gaya
sochane lagee kaheen shoony mein jaakar
aansoo aankhon se tapatap kar bahane lage
doktar kumaar ne dekha use to dhairy bandhaate hue bole veena se  dhairy se kaam leejie mainne kuchh nateeja to nahin nikaala hai
doktar hoon shak to jaata hee hai
sirph achchhe kee sochoonga to beemaaree ko pakad kaise paoonga aap itanee badee pareshaanee to pahale dekh chukee hain
maut ke munh se aapake pati pahale hee baahar aa chuke hain
ab ghabaraane se kuchh nahin hoga
sachchaee ko saamane rakhana mera kartavy hai lekin isamen ghabaraane se kaam nahin chalega
pareshaanee aaee hai to usaka saamana aapako karana hai
veena kya kahatee
bas aansoo ponchh lie usane
sach ka saamana to shaadee ke pahale din se hee kar rahee thee
ab to use dev ka dard apane dardasa lagane laga tha
yahee lag raha tha ki saamane aaee jis pareshaanee kee baat doktar kar raha hai usase vah bahut pahale se hee parichit hai
jaise vah dev ke saath shuroo se hee bandhee hai aur ab dev kee niyati usakee apanee niyati hai
apane achchhe kee kaamana use karanee chaahie iseelie vah apanee niyati se ladane ko taiyaar thee
iseelie doktar kumaar kee baat sunakar vah chup rahee
ab mujhe kya karana hoga  dev ne svayan ko sanyamit rakhate hue poochha
is par doktar kumaar ne kaha  aap abhee laib mein chale jaeee
main slip banae deta hoon
ekado din baad aapaka test ho jaega aur usake ek saptaah tak riport aa jaegee
tab tak aap apanee dard kee davaee lete rahie
yah kahakar doktar kumaar ne dev kee phaeel mein apanee raay likh dee aur use dev ko thama diya
shukriya doktar saahab aapaka  dev uth khada hua
sabane pranaam karake doktar kumaar se vida lee
amit baahar baitha patrika ke panne palat raha tha
unhen baahar aaya dekh kar khada ho gaya
usane devaveena ke chehare par pareshaanee ke lakshan jhat se padh lie bola  kya bola doktar ne aap log kuchh chintit hain
veena ne tab muskuraane kee cheshta kee aur bolee  kuchh bhee baat nahin abhee bas kuchh test batae hain
test
kaise test  poochha usane
boyopsee  dev ne kah diya
sunakar chaunka vah
bola
boyopsee phir se kyon  boyopsee ka naam sunate hee use paseena aa gaya
is test kee dahashat vah pahale jhel chuka tha
abhee kuchh nahin pata
veena ne kaha aur aansoo svayan bah nikale usakee aankhon se
tab garg saahab bole  veena jee jab dev se shaadee ke baad aap mujhe milee theen tab mainne aapako man hee man pranaam kiya tha
aapane dev ke saath shaadee rachaakar jo himmat dikhaee usee himmat ko kaayam rakhie
dekhana kuchh nahin hoga
mujhe dekhie main kitana bhalaachanga hoon
pandrah saal ho chale hain mujhe opareshan karavae
tabhee unhen kuchh yaad aaya vah dev kee or dekhate hue bolemujhe bhee apanee galatee ka ehasaas ho raha hai
mainne bhee aapase opareshan ke vishay mein hamesha poochha lekin kabhee bhee rediyotharaipee kee baat nahin kee
yahee socha tha ki vah to jaroor huee hogee
is par dev ne kaha  mainne bhee to kabhee jaanane kee koshish nahin kee
theek ho gaya
sab achchha lagane laga tha jaanane kee koshish bhee nahin kee ki raidiyotharaipee kee jaroorat kyon padatee hai
opareshan ke baad mujhe kabhee koee pareshaanee nahin huee
doktar ne bhee to kabhee is baat ka jikr nahin kiya
ab doktar itanee laaparavaahee karega aisa to main kabhee soch bhee nahin sakata tha
dekho dev main is tarah ke kes bahut samay se dekhata aa raha hoon
opareshan se pahale mile hote to kabhee bhee salaah na deta ki is opareshan ko kisee praeevet narsing hom mein karavao
yaheen aims mein aa jaate to kuchh bhee nahin hota
doktar gupta yoon to bahut bade sarjan hain lekin meree jaanakaaree mein unhonne aaj tak is tarah ke keval do hee opareshan kie hain
ek tumhaara aur usase paanchachhah saal pahale kisee vargees ka
vah to opareshan tebal par hee dam tod gaya tha
yadi ve paise ke laalach mein ya phir apane kshetr mein aur adhik naam karane ke chakkar mein na hote to tumhaara opareshan hee na karate
tumhen yaheen bhej dete
kuchh ruk kar phir bole  svayan sochie unhen hamaaree sanstha tak ke vishay mein nahin pata tha
yadi jaanakaaree hotee to kya apane baigs ke lie tumhen aur tumhaare bhaee ko itana bhatakana padata lekin ab beetee baaton par kya dhyaan dena
jo ho chuka hai use ham ab badal nahin sakate  garg saahab ne apanee baat vaheen khatm kar dee
lekin yah to laaparavaahee hai doktar kee  veena ne yah sab sunakar kaha
yah laaparavaahee hai ya paise kee ya naam kamaane kee lalak ab kya sochana
ab bas hamen test karavaana chaahie aur aage kee yojana banaanee chaahie  garg saahab kee baat sabhee ko uchit lagee
lekin amit bechain ho utha tha
doktar gupta par use gussa aa raha tha
lekin ab eeshvareey sahaayata kee sabhee dua kar rahe the
dev boyopsee karavaane ko ghabara raha tha
dar baith gaya tha usake man mein
kisee ne kaha yadi boyopsee hogee to ruke hue kainsar ke keetaanu jaldeejaldee phailana shuroo kar denge
dev kee soch sankuchit hue ja rahee thee
man mein sochata ki yadi kainsar ke keetaanu dubaara shareer mein pravisht kar gae to vah bach na paega
aise mein sab kuchh samaapt ho jaega
vah nahin rahega aur aise mein veena ka kya hoga veena kee chinta use man hee man khae ja rahee thee
man ke har kone mein usake bandh gaee thee veena
aisa lagane laga tha ki vah usake saath kaee janmon se bandhee hai
vahee usake jeevan ka abhinn ang hai aur isee ang se use sabase adhik prem hai
apane ko us ang se alag pada dekhana jaise ab usake bas kee baat nahin
usakee aankhen ab apane kasht ko lekar bechain nahin usakee aankhen ab bechain hain veena se bichhud jaane ke dar se
moh mein vyakti ka man aise jakad jaata hai ki jo hai usase bichhud jaane ka gam use khaane lagata hai
aaj beemaaree kee chinta use isalie hai ki usake phalasvaroop vah veena se bichhud sakata hai
kuchh bhee ho jae use par koee aisa saadhan ban jae ki vichhoh na ho apane priyajan se
aise mein usane veena se poochh liya  veena
kaheen phir se kuchh ho gaya mujhe to tumhaara kya hoga
aisa kyon kahate ho dev tumhen kuchh nahin hoga
abhee dard hai usakee chinta hai
vah theek ho jaega
tumhen aur kuchh nahin hoga
veena ke shabdon ne use dhaadhas bandhaaya
lekin vah svayan ko vichaaron ke bhanvar mein phansa pa rahee thee
saamane kasht dekhakar kasht ke phalasvaroop svayan ko bhayagrast dekhakar achchhe kee kalpana nahin ho sakatee
main bahut dar gaya hoon  dev ne apane man kee baat prakat kee
lekin is dar se door bhee to nahin bhaag sakate   veena ne phir use sahaara diya
haan main jaanata hoon door nahin bhaag sakate lekin kya karoon isaka saamana karane kee himmat nahin juta pa raha
dev ne phir kaha
lekin is shak ko to door karana hai na jarooree to nahin ki test pojitav hee ho
veena shaayad is shak ke bhanvar se jald baahar nikalana chaahatee thee
jo sach hai usee ka saamana karana chaahatee thee na ki sach aur jhooth ke bhanvar mein phanse rahana chaahatee thee
aur yadi hua to isee baat ka dar to mujhe khae ja raha hai
dev ke mastishk ne jaise usaka saath chhod diya tha
is dar ke saath jeena bhee to theek nahin
sach jo bhee hai saamane aaega aur us sach ke anusaar hee to aage jeene kee yojana banaee ja sakatee hai
aaj to ham kuchh bhee sochane kee sthiti mein nahin
baat kitanee uchit kahee thee veena ne dev samajh gaya usakee baat
theek hai tum jaisa kahogee vahee hoga aaj ke baad
dev ne saaree jimmedaaree veena par daal dee aur svayan ko nireeh maan liya
vyakti jab sach ka saamana nahin karana chaahata tab vah sach ho jaane ke baad hee kisee ke mukh se sunana chaahata hai
sach ko dekhane kee sahane kee shakti chalee jaatee hai tab keval niraasha hee niraasha nazar aatee hai
